infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs access to camera to take photos of civic issues.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app needs access to microphone for speech-to-text functionality.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app needs access to location to automatically detect where civic issues are reported.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow CivicEye to access your camera to take photos of civic issues.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow CivicEye to use your location to automatically detect where issues are reported.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow CivicEye to access your photo library to upload images of civic issues.
